Education Background:
Frey finished secondary school at Kantonsschule Sursee Luzern in 1990.
After that, he went on to study at University of St. Gallen until 1995.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 29 years, Frey Meier Werner has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Frey Meier Werner began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at Pfizer AG (Swiss branch) in 1996, laying the foundation for future success.
At Pfizer AG (Swiss branch), he held the position of Clinical Trials Manager from 1997 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.

During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 730000 CHF.
He is still learning about investment strategies and market dynamics.
